questions.question: What is blockchain technology?
answers: A centralized ledger for recording transactions
A distributed ledger for recording transactions
A type of digital currency
A social media platform

questions.question: What is decentralization?
answers: A system where decisions are made by a single party
A system where decisions are made through a consensus mechanism
A system where transactions are recorded on a centralized ledger
A system where transactions are not recorded at all

questions.question: What is cryptocurrency?
answers: A physical currency made of metal or paper
A digital or virtual currency that uses cryptography to secure and verify transactions
A type of stock in a company
A type of bond issued by a government

questions.question: What is the main difference between centralized and decentralized networks?
answers: Centralized networks are more transparent than decentralized networks
Decentralized networks are more resistant to censorship than centralized networks
Centralized networks are controlled by a network of nodes
Decentralized networks are controlled by a single party

questions.question: What are smart contracts?
answers: Contracts that are automatically executed based on predefined conditions
Contracts that are only executed if both parties agree to the terms
Contracts that are written on paper and signed by both parties
Contracts that are executed by a central authority
